# Varanasi On Wheels - Premium Cab & Tempo Traveller Rental Service

> Varanasi On Wheels is the leading cab and tempo traveller rental service in Varanasi, India. We provide reliable, affordable transportation for pilgrimage tours, airport transfers, local sightseeing, and outstation trips.

## Quick Facts
- Location: Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, India
- Phone: +91 7800664900
- Email: varanasionwheels5@gmail.com
- Website: https://varanasionwheels.com
- Service Area: Varanasi, Ayodhya, Prayagraj, Gaya, Lucknow, and all of North India
- Available: 24/7, 365 days

## Our Fleet & Pricing (2025)

### Tempo Travellers (Most Popular)
- 12 Seater Tempo Traveller: ₹24/km (Airport: ₹2,500, Local 8hr: ₹5,000)
- 17 Seater Tempo Traveller: ₹25/km (Airport: ₹2,600, Local 8hr: ₹5,200)
- 20 Seater Tempo Traveller: ₹27/km (Airport: ₹2,700, Local 8hr: ₹5,400)
- 26 Seater Tempo Traveller: ₹32/km (Airport: ₹3,000, Local 8hr: ₹5,700)
- Maharaja Tempo Traveller (Luxury): ₹34/km (Airport: ₹3,300, Local 8hr: ₹6,000)

### Premium Vehicles
- Innova Crysta (6+1 Seater): ₹18/km (Airport: ₹1,350, Local 8hr: ₹2,400)
- Force Urbania (17 Seater Luxury): ₹35/km (Airport: ₹3,500, Local 8hr: ₹6,200)

### Economy Options
- Swift Dzire (4+1 Seater): ₹12/km (Airport: ₹850, Local 8hr: ₹1,800)
- Maruti Ertiga (6+1 Seater): ₹16/km (Airport: ₹1,775, Local 8hr: ₹2,200)

### Luxury Buses
- 40 Seater Luxury Bus: ₹56/km
- 45 Seater Luxury Bus: ₹62/km
- 49 Seater Luxury Bus: ₹69/km

## Popular Routes & Services

### Airport Transfers
- Varanasi Airport (Lal Bahadur Shastri Airport) pickup and drop
- Ayodhya Airport transfers
- Prayagraj Airport transfers

### Pilgrimage Tours
- Kashi Vishwanath Temple darshan
- Varanasi Ghat tours (Dashashwamedh, Manikarnika, Assi)
- Ganga Aarti experience
- Sarnath Buddhist pilgrimage
- Varanasi-Ayodhya-Prayagraj circuit
- Varanasi-Gaya-Bodhgaya Buddhist circuit

### Outstation Trips from Varanasi
- Varanasi to Ayodhya: ~200 km
- Varanasi to Prayagraj (Allahabad): ~120 km
- Varanasi to Gaya: ~250 km
- Varanasi to Bodhgaya: ~280 km
- Varanasi to Lucknow: ~300 km
- Varanasi to Chitrakoot: ~280 km

## Why Choose Varanasi On Wheels?

1. Transparent Pricing: No hidden charges, all-inclusive rates
2. Well-Maintained Fleet: Regular servicing, clean vehicles
3. Professional Drivers: Experienced, local knowledge, multilingual
4. 24/7 Availability: Round-the-clock booking and support
5. Flexible Booking: WhatsApp, phone, or online
6. Group Specialists: Expert in handling large pilgrimage groups

### Payment Terms
- Advance booking recommended for peak season
- Multiple payment options available
- GST (5%) applicable on all bookings

### Cancellation Policy
- Free cancellation up to 24 hours before trip
- Partial refund for cancellations within 24 hours

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What is the best vehicle for a family trip to Varanasi?
A: For families of 4-6, we recommend Innova Crysta (₹18/km). For larger families, 12-seater Tempo Traveller (₹24/km) offers great value.

Q: How much does a tempo traveller cost in Varanasi?
A: Tempo Traveller prices range from ₹24/km (12-seater) to ₹34/km (Maharaja luxury). Airport pickup starts at ₹2,500.

Q: Do you provide drivers with the vehicles?
A: Yes, all our rentals include professional, experienced drivers who know Varanasi and surrounding areas well.

Q: What is included in the rental price?
A: Driver charges and fuel are included. Toll taxes, parking, state permits, and GST (5%) are extra.

Q: Can I book for outstation trips?
A: Yes, we specialize in outstation trips. Minimum 250 km/day applies for outstation bookings.

Q: Do you offer airport pickup service?
A: Yes, we provide 24/7 airport pickup and drop service at Varanasi, Ayodhya, and Prayagraj airports.
